data.name: SD3: Chocolate Cake Drums - WholeLotta Kit
data.detailed_description:
Cakewalk has teamed up with ChocolateAudio to bring you the Chocolate Cake Drums: WholeLotta Kit for Session Drummer 3. If you have a sweet tooth for high-quality drum sounds then Chocolate Cake Drums are sure to satisfy. This kit was meticulously sampled by the artisans at ChocolateAudio to create some of the most authentic virtual drums available.

Highlights:

  • A Ludwig kit with Ludwig snare: 24"x16" kick, 14", 16" and 18" Toms, 14"x6" Snare, Paiste Cymbals.
  • Recorded ay 96KHz/24bit at ChocolateAudio Studio, delivered at 44.1KHz/24bit.
  • Recorded and Produced by Simone Coen for ChocolateAudio. Editing and programming by Simone Coen and Sara Rusignuolo.
  • Kick: 16 velocities - 2 variations (round robins) - Total: 32 samples.
  • Snare: Side 24 velocities, Standard Hit 24 velocities - 2 variations (round robins), Rim Hit 24 velocities - 2 variations (round robins) - Total: 120 samples.
  • Hat 15": Pedal 16 velocities, Tip and Shank with 14 velocities - 2 variations (round robins) - 5 positions (closed to open) (the 3 extra positions apart from closed and fully open are mapped as Percussions) - Total: 296 samples.
  • Ride: 16 velocities - 3 positions (Bell, Mid and Edge) - Total: 48 samples.
  • Toms: 3 Toms (Hi, Low and Floor) 16 velocities - 2 variations (round robins) each - Total: 96 samples.
  • Cymbals: Crash 14", Crash 16", Crash 18", China 18" with 14/16 velocities each and Splash 10" (6 velocities) - Total: 66 samples.
  • TOTAL: 658 samples.

data.short_description: Cakewalk has teamed up with ChocolateAudio to bring you the Chocolate Cake Drums: WholeLotta Kit for Session Drummer 3. If you have a sweet tooth for high-quality drum sounds then Chocolate Cake Drums are sure to satisfy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, or 10 (32- or 64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.6GHz Intel or AMD multi-core processor
  • Graphics: 1280x800 (1920 x 1080+ recommended)
  • Storage: 420 MB available space
  • Sound Card: ASIO compatible hardware is recommended
